title: Uganda Museum
description: Explore Uganda's cultural and historical heritage.

title: Ndere Cultural Centre
description: A venue showcasing traditional music and dance.

title: Gaddafi National Mosque
description: One of the largest mosques in Africa with panoramic city views.

title: Craft Market
description: A bustling market full of handmade Ugandan crafts.

description: Royal residence of the Buganda Kingdom.

title: Lake Victoria Viewpoint
description: A scenic point to view Lake Victoria and surrounding nature.
